snippet: Jackie Bradley Jr. had four hits and four R.B.I., David Ortiz had two doubles, and Boston handed Toronto, the American League East leader, its fourth loss in 16 games.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Boston Red Sox defeat Toronto Blue Jays, 11-4; other baseball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Jackie Bradley Jr. had four hits and four R.B.I., David Ortiz had two doubles, and Boston handed Toronto, the American League East leader, its fourth loss in 16 games.

headline.print_headline: Blue Jays Fall to a Barrage in Boston
headline.main: Blue Jays Fall to a Red Sox Barrage
